sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductEntity } from 'src/app/interface/productEntity'; import { productServicio } from 'src/app/servicios/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit{ searchRunning: boolean = false; products: ProductEntity[] = []; @Input() SearchResults :ProductEntity[] =[]; constructor( private _productService: productServicio ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadMostSelling(); } ngOnChanges(changes: SimpleChanges) { if(this.SearchResults.length != 0){ this.products = this.SearchResults; this.searchRunning = true; console.log(this.SearchResults); }else{ this.searchRunning = false; } } loadMostSelling(){ this._productService.mostSellingList() .subscribe((seleccion: ProductEntity[]) => { this.products = seleccion; }) .add() } }
